content: The women in the Joy Luck Club named it as such because they believed that playing mahjong and gathering together brought them luck and joy. The name represents the hope and optimism they found in each other's company and the belief that their friendship and support could bring them good fortune. The name also reflects the idea that, through their gatherings, they could create their own luck and happiness, despite the challenges and difficulties they faced in their lives. In this way, the name of the club symbolizes the power of community and the importance of finding joy and hope in life, even in the face of adversity.
